transcript.speaker: Salesperson
transcript.text: Good afternoon, Mr. Smith! I’m Sarah, your real estate agent. How are you today?

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: Hi Sarah, I’m doing well, thank you. Excited to see the house!

transcript.speaker: Salesperson
transcript.text: Great! Let’s start with the living room. As you can see, it’s very spacious and gets a lot of natural light from the large windows. It’s perfect for family gatherings or entertaining guests.

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: It does look bright and airy. What’s the square footage here?

transcript.speaker: Salesperson
transcript.text: The living room alone is about 350 square feet, and the entire house is just under 2,500 square feet.

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: Nice. And what about the flooring? Is this hardwood?

transcript.speaker: Salesperson
transcript.text: Yes, you’re right. The living room, along with the dining area, has beautiful oak hardwood flooring. It’s not only durable but also adds a warm touch to the interior.

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: I like that. How old is this house, by the way?

transcript.speaker: Salesperson
transcript.text: It was built in 2010, so it’s relatively new and has been very well-maintained by the previous owners. They actually did some recent renovations to the kitchen, which I think you’ll love. Shall we take a look?

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: Sure, lead the way.

transcript.speaker: Salesperson
transcript.text: Here we are. As you can see, the kitchen features modern stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, and a large island with a breakfast bar. It’s a great space for cooking and socializing.

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: I love the island. It’s perfect for morning coffee. How about storage space?

transcript.speaker: Salesperson
transcript.text: Good question. There’s plenty of storage with these custom cabinets, and there's also a pantry closet just over there. You won’t run out of space for kitchen essentials.

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: That’s a plus. What about the bedrooms? Are they spacious?

transcript.speaker: Salesperson
transcript.text: Yes, absolutely. The master bedroom is quite large and features a walk-in closet and an ensuite bathroom. Let’s go upstairs and take a look.

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: Okay, I’m curious to see it.

transcript.speaker: Salesperson
transcript.text: Here we are. As you can see, the master bedroom offers a lot of space. It also has these large windows that let in plenty of light, making the room feel even bigger. The ensuite bathroom comes with a dual vanity, a soaking tub, and a separate shower.

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: This is really nice. I can see myself relaxing here. How many bedrooms are there in total?

transcript.speaker: Salesperson
transcript.text: There are four bedrooms, including the master. Each room is spacious and can comfortably fit a queen-sized bed, making it ideal for a growing family or guests.

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: Sounds good. And how about the backyard? I’d love to see that too.

transcript.speaker: Salesperson
transcript.text: Of course, follow me. The backyard is one of the highlights of this property. It’s fully fenced for privacy, has a nice patio area for barbecues, and there’s plenty of green space for kids to play or to start a garden.

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: This is perfect. I can imagine having friends over for a cookout here.

transcript.speaker: Salesperson
transcript.text: Exactly! It’s a great spot for entertaining. And there’s even room for a small pool if that’s something you’d consider in the future.

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: Interesting! I’ll keep that in mind. What’s the asking price again?

transcript.speaker: Salesperson
transcript.text: The asking price is $550,000. Given the size of the property and the features it offers, it’s quite a competitive price in this neighborhood.

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: That seems reasonable. I’ll have to discuss it with my spouse, but I’m definitely interested. What are the next steps if we decide to make an offer?

transcript.speaker: Salesperson
transcript.text: If you decide to proceed, I can help you with the paperwork to make an offer. We’d also discuss any contingencies you might want to include. Once the offer is accepted, we can schedule a home inspection and move forward from there.

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: Sounds good. I appreciate your time, Sarah. This has been very helpful.

transcript.speaker: Salesperson
transcript.text: You’re welcome, Mr. Smith. I’m here to help with any questions you might have. Just give me a call anytime!
